title: Readout of National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan's Meeting with Prime Minister and Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman | The White House
content: National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan met today with Prime Minister and Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. They discussed a number of bilateral and regional matters, including ongoing efforts to create new conditions for an enduring and sustainable peace between Israelis and Palestinians. They also discussed the humanitarian response in Gaza, including efforts to increase the flow of critical aid. Finally, they discussed areas of deepening bilateral cooperation in the fields of security, commerce, space exploration, and advanced technologies, including open radio access (O-Ran) networks.Â
